page.title: 06THE RIVER FROME
page.content:
The{River Frome}is a tributary of the {River Avon}and starts near Old Sodbury.On the day we checked the speed of flow,after heavy rain,our marker took between 25 and 35 seconds to travel 20 metres giving a speed of about 2km to the hour.We looked at the trees and plants along the bank and saw willows,alders,reeds,and teasels.There was quite a lot of polution along the banks and we found five shopping trolleys as well as lots of cans and other rubbish in the river.If people took care of the{River Frome}it could be a nice place to walk by and visit.{
Dean Atkins St Mary's
